artefact: Explosives on vessels and in harbours licence

artefact.overview: You need a licence to bring, handle, load or unload explosives in a harbour
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to bring, handle, load or unload explosives in a harbour.
artefact.licence_overview: To bring explosives into a harbour, handle explosives in a harbour, and load and unload explosives within a harbour you need a licence from the [Health & Safety Executive (HSE)](http://www.hse.gov.uk/ "Health and Safety Executive (HSE)"){:rel="external"} in England, Scotland and Wales. In Northern Ireland you need a licence from the [Northern Ireland Office (NIO).](http://www.nio.gov.uk/ "Northern Ireland Office (NIO)"){:rel="external"}
